name: Know me
description:
Clear a path among hordes of enemies, follow the compass and reveal your true self.

 Developed in 72 hours for the Talentum Game Jam

A game by Green Glob Studios: @greenglobsalsa

Programmer: Iván Uriel Jiménez Vidal - @iviuriel3

Concept/Assets artist: Alejandro Pérez Álvarez - @Sharkon_WoW

Animator and asset artist: Jorge Domínguez Egea - @jordoe3

Programmer: Álvaro Gómez Haro - @Snadker

Game Design made by everyone on the team
